name: Monster Jam Jam
description:
Behold Studios took almost 24 hours, a lot of pizzas, chocolate milk and sodas to create this simple but very fun game. Is a local multiplayer or a singleplayer against AI fight, with dense strategy and simple tasks.

In each turn, both players choose an action – Attack, Load, Heal or Guard – and both actions happens at the same time. Lose the player who first gets to zero points of health.
developers: Behold Studios Jogos Eletronicos LTDA ME
publishers: Behold Studios Jogos Eletronicos LTDA ME
